game.name: Farming Sweeper
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build, manage and grow your farm in a unique way: Solving puzzles with traditional minesweeper mechanics and managing your business finances in a relaxing game with great replay factor.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build, manage and grow your farm in a unique way: Solving puzzles with traditional minesweeper mechanics and managing your business finances in a relaxing game with great replay factor.
